original_text: The men who were taking care of the pigs saw this happen. They ran away. They told the people in the town and in the villages what had happened.
korean_text: 치던 자들이 그 이루어진 일을 보고 도망하여 성내와 마을에 알리니

sentences.original_text: The men who were taking care of the pigs
They told the people in the town
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 동네 사람들에게 일어난 일을 알렸다

sentences.original_text: and in the villages what had happened
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마을 사람들에게도 무슨 일이 있었는지 알렸다
